actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a tax credit for small employer-based health insurance coverage in States in which such coverage is mandated, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Business State Mandated Health Insurance Assistance Act of 2003

summary.text: Small Business State Mandated Health Insurance Assistance Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish, in the case of a qualified small employer, a limited employee health insurance expenses credit.

titles.title: Small Business State Mandated Health Insurance Assistance Act of 2003
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a tax credit for small employer-based health insurance coverage in States in which such coverage is mandated, and for other purposes.
